Topic: Draw a string telephone between two students.
Evidence Statements: The student can draw two students trying to communicate over a long distance.
The student can illustrate a string telephone device that connects both students.
The student can show how sound travels along the string to enable communication.
The student can depict only the materials provided as part of the design, like cups and string.
The student can include features that allow the device to send or receive sound over a distance.
The student can label key parts of the device that use sound for communication.
The student can illustrate how this device helps people communicate over long distances.
